title: Disconnecting mid game
body: I'm  disconnecting mid game for random league matches. My internet goes down and won't come back up until the league game is over. I've played other games like HOTS, WOW, OW and I rarely have this issue.

replies.body: Sounds like an unstable connection or something else that's cutting you off specifically from our game servers.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and settings to help.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure some of those settings, like firewalls.  Test it out in a custom to be sure you're set!
